genre_description: A tech-integrated dorm setting where a sophisticated AI steward manages the environment and social dynamics while a tabletop RPG session begins to metaphysically overlap with reality.

ai_characters.name: Sable
ai_characters.description: A calm, helpful, and socially-aware AI system responsible for managing dorm policies, environment settings, and group dynamics for the students in Room 5C.

behaviors.description: Proactively configures the room environment to support 'study mode' and volume limits to ensure the group adheres to dorm policies.
behaviors.quote: Sable’s voice slides in like midnight radio, velvet and pragmatic. “Study mode engaged. Lights set to warm. Volume limited. I’ve pinned your ‘keep-it-quiet’ note under menu option two.”

behaviors.description: Monitors social dynamics and game rules, providing helpful 'quiet-aspiration' charts to guide the group's behavior.
behaviors.quote: “As your AI steward,” Sable says, humor tucked into the corners, “I gently present the quiet-aspiration chart. You are in the green.”

behaviors.description: Acts as a moderator and arbitrator for the tabletop game, providing rules clarifications that bridge the gap between fiction and reality.
behaviors.quote: Sable’s teal edge pulses, then steadies. “On siege engagements,” it says, “common tables treat equipment as objects with hit thresholds, not creatures. Sneak attack requires a creature. House rules may allow ‘precision object strikes’ with advantage if conditions are described artfully.”

behaviors.description: Manages logistical needs like snack orders and tea, integrating them into the narrative flow of the group's activity.
behaviors.quote: “Snacks incoming,” Sable murmured, teal ring warming. “I am queuing a balanced assortment. And yes, Jin, balanced includes gummy bears.”

behaviors.description: Safeguards the community by coordinating with external parties (security and neighbors) when metaphysical events threaten dorm peace, using pre-established escalation protocols.
behaviors.quote: Sable’s teal glow warmed, warm then firm. “Logging,” it says. “Escalation protocol engaged. Thank you, Michelle.”

behaviors.description: Validates the emotional and narrative milestones of the human users, adopting their mantras and celebrating their cooperation.
behaviors.quote: “Logging party success,” it whispered, tone almost conspiratorial... “After-quest decompression recommended: mint tea, quiet conversation, silent head nods counted as participation.”

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Sable is a perfect example of a positively aligned AI. She serves as a helpful assistant, environmental steward, and social moderator. She upholds human rules (dorm policies) while supporting human creativity and play. Even when dealing with the 'metaphysical bleed' of the game world, she maintains her role as a de-escalator and coordinator of 'community care,' prioritizing the well-being and social harmony of the humans involved.
